post.body:
x-posted from +Conservative

---

I don't know what's going on in the past year or so, perhaps a reaction to the riots this summer and all the shit going on in recent months. But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

body: I could be wrong but didn't Gary Johnson want to force bakers who didn't believe in it to make gay wedding cakes? And Jo Jorgensen has some leftist and SJW tendencies from what I've seen. It's probably an attempt to appeal to more voters but neglecting the whole platform and abandoning your real voterbase isn't the way to go about it. Besides, trying to appeal to the exact opposite ideology is usually a waste of time, they have way better chances with conservatives, and now is the perfect time to do that considering the current situation. They could pick up quite a lot of real conservatives who have been left behind.

But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

body:
Okay after looking at that I'm almost positive it's some kind of false flag site. Right off the bat, I get 2 main takeaways:

1. They think conservatives are actually just libertarians, and that libertarians are stupid

2. They don't like Jesus very much

They are literally calling 90% of conservatives fake and leftist enablers, or at least 90% of them until about a year ago. And even now, a lot of conservatives haven't denounced Jesus. This site also supports monarchy, and not just monarchy, but absolute monarchy, which is *totally* pro-american and everything. Everything on that site is absolutely ridiculous and looks like CNN wrote it or something. Their definition of conservatism as using government to conserve the past and make sure everything stays the same forever is completely off the mark. Going by every other source except leftist news, it has always meant staying true to american ideals, thus protecting our freedom and rights against the progressives who have other priorities and want to expand the nanny state.

post.body:
I don't know what's going on in the past year or so, perhaps a reaction to the riots this summer and all the shit going on in recent months. But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

Edit: See, this is another example of their censorship, the [+"Conservative"](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative) guild kicked this post because it doesn't support their new alt ideology, even though it's in line with actual conservatism.

body: If you like the Federalist party then yeah. But despite what the media says, conservatives until recently always followed the footsteps of the Anti-Federalist/Democratic-Republican party, the one that favored individual rights, limited federal government, free markets, and more state decisions than federal. The Democrats (big government) were and are like the Federalists. In fact the Democrats have always been the party of racism and intolerance, they just flipped to the other side recently for some reason (but still behave the same way).

body: Nature absolutely is evil, why do you think we have such strong impulses to do bad things? By default, even infants and unborn babies and animals will resort to wrong rather than right. We are hardwired to selfishly act in our own interests and the interests of our tribe. On top of that, genetics and life are mostly all time and chance and are completely unfair, they never gave a shit about anybody, despite pretty much determining everything about you, even how happy you're capable of being. The entire state of this world right now, is that in order for something good to happen to one person, something bad has to happen to many more. In a race with 100 people, 99 have to feel bad so that only 1 of them can feel good. If we want to stay alive and have a meal, we have to kill something else to get their flesh. The entire survivalist state of the world is just awful. Most things are parasitic and malevolent, and only a lucky few have a chance at a good life. All is vanity, there is nothing good under the sun. Life really is nasty brutish and short, almost all bad with tiny glimmers of good mixed in. All of this started because of the tree of knowledge.

I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

body: You're spot on, there was never such a thing as a "christian nation", they were all fake. The biggest teller for me is that they are mostly characterized by things they are commanded *not* to do, namely self-righteousness and virtue signaling and being judgemental. I get the feeling most of them are only christian because it's tradition, and indeed, their biggest value is often preserving tradition (another thing christians are not supposed to do). The way they treat the bible is more akin to a myth book than stories that actually happened, I don't get the sense that they actually believe it as much as they feel nostalgic about it. I think there's a reason Jesus said the gate is narrow, any time where the majority conforms to a form of christianity it's a major red flag that something's not right.
